subsense.idiom: sb is eager to do sth
keep/have one's ear to the ground
turn a deaf ear to sth
the ebb and flow of sth
sb cannot get a word in edgeways
subsense.trans: ktoś nie może wtrącić ani słowa

subsense.idiom: make the effort to do sth

subsense.example: they are on either sides of the room
subsense.trans: znajdują się po obu stronach pomieszczenia

subsense.idiom: at the end of the day
err on the side of sth
will you excuse me for a moment?

subsense.idarex: [cast V: | run V:] PROPOSS eye :over NP

subsense.idiom: *keep one's eyes open/keep an eye out*
more to it than meets the eye
be up to one's eyes in sth
